summary: A documentary following Kenzo Okuzaki, a 62-year-old WW2 veteran notorious for his protests against Emperor Hirohito, as he tries to expose the needless executions of two Japanese soldiers during the war.
cast: Kenzo Okuzaki|Riichi Aikawa|Masaichi Hamaguchi|Toshio Hara|Shichiro Kojima|Masao Koshimizu|Taro Maruyama|Toshiya Nomura|Shizumi Okuzaki|Eizaburo Oshima|Rinko Sakimoto|Yukio Seo|Iseko Shimamoto|Minoru Takami|Kichitaro Yamada
title: Yuki yukite, shingun
